item.name: Get Consumer Files By Identity ID

graphql.query:
query {
  getConsumerFilesByIdentityId(IdentityId:"a8e44a66-db6e-4ec5-b0c3-8bf3c3772ac9")
  {
      consumerFileId
      identityId
      fastRegion
      regionID
      fastFileId
      fastFileNumber
      firstName
      middleName
      lastName     
      transactionType
  }
}
